Posts.Content: I was just diagnosed with DCIS.  Here is my question.  I had a MRI.  (just for surveillence because I'm BRCA2 and in my thirties)  The found something!!  The next week a had a MRI guided core biopsy with a mammogram.  What are the chances that the pathology report after surgery will find something is invasive?
Posts.Title: new diagnosis--please help!
